channel.title: Stopping people from duping and unnattackable npc
channel.description:
ok, i need to make a method so when people join, they have to wait 20 minutes before making their first trade or pking, any ideas?
and i also asked this yesterday, but i just cant seem to get it, how can i make it so you cant attack an npc? ( dont say 0 hp, that doesnt work) because when u click on the npc, it will come for you before you attack it, i need to make it:
1. non aggressive, and non attackable

item.title: Stopping people from duping and unnattackable npc
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

ok, i need to make a method so when people join, they have to wait 20 minutes before making their first trade or pking, any ideas?

and i also asked this yesterday, but i just cant seem to get it, how can i make it so you cant attack an npc? ( dont say 0 hp, that doesnt work) because when u click on the npc, it will come for you before you attack it, i need to make it:

  1. non aggressive, and non attackable
